text: Ezɨ fofozir gumazir kaba atrivimɨn akam baregha, kamaghɨn a ikaragha ghaze, “Atrivim, nguazir kamɨn gumazitam bizir nɨ damuasa e mɨkemezim damighan kogham. Bar puvatɨ. Atrivim, atrivir gavgavir ekiatam, uan irebar mɨngaribagh fogha dar gun mɨgeir gumazitam, ko kukunir gumazitam, ko akavsiar ifavaribagh amir gumazitam, an azangsɨzir katamɨn a gamizir puvatɨ.
